https://tmrev.io/movie/81619-Better This World 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/To2yYnC9AF7nKaPhN1DPJBizP9.jpg Set amid arrests and subsequent trials surrounding the 2008 Republican National Convention, this portrait of two young activists caught in the web of an opportunistic mentor and a desperate justice system poignantly describes both the problems of power and the power of forgiveness and love. Better This World
